name: resource up game
description:
Hello! It's just a small project where I'm trying out the mechanics and just having fun with the design) Something cosmic and steampunk.

The mechanics of this prototype consists of only a few actions - you need to click on the base and send the ship that appears for metals or crystals, and then build another base from the resources.

1. Click on the base and get the ship

2. Send a ship for a resource

3. Accumulate the right amount of resources

4. Buy a new base

Thanks for watching my projects! I would like to put more emphasis on design, I love to draw.

The project was created with the help of Construct 2 and Sai. Music in the prototype without copyright, randomly generated.
